Themed Team-Up: Fantastic Four
If Black Panther is on a Fantastic Four themed team, friendly characters with the Fantastic Four keyword can use Precision Strike.
0 Points
Special Powers

Goop
If you are running an Invisible Woman that lets you switch figs at start of game and you see a lot of super senses coming, this guy will really give your FF team a strong advantage. He's a great sideline piece.
